Question: This person went on to say "the main point is to get a young and insecure science into a place of safety during an earthquake".
Hints: Emilie Preiswerk was the youngest child of Samuel Preiswerk who was also Paul Achilles ****'s professor of Hebrew.
This person saw the human psyche as "by nature religious", and made this religiousness the focus of his explorations.
In 1908, this person became an editor of the newly founded Yearbook for Psychoanalytical and Psychopathological Research.
